attributes.action: Reintroduce tax relief for Profit-Related Pay
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Conservatives abolished tax relief for Profit-Related Pay shortly before leaving office.  Yet, the tax relief was an important incentive for employers to share their profits with employees and for employees to make their companies profitable.  The relief should be reintroduced at a rate similar to what it was when it was abolished.
